## Checklist

- [ ] Tested changes.
- [ ] Updated documentation (if applicable).
- [ ] I have used the appropriate conventional commit prefix in my PR title to trigger the desired release type

| Prefix            | Semantic Release Bump |
| ----------------- | --------------------- |
| `BREAKING CHANGE` | Major                 |
| `feat`            | Minor                 |
| `perf`            | Minor                 |
| `fix`             | Patch                 |
| `revert`          | Revert                |
| `refactor`        | Patch                 |
| `style`           | Patch                 |
| `docs`            | None                  |
| `test`            | None                  |
| `build`           | None                  |
| `ci`              | None                  |
| `chore`           | None                  |
